mapper.select: SELECT su.nickname, ep.exam_plan_name, org.`name` AS org_name, tepu.* FROM ted_enroll_pre_upload tepu LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON tepu.candidates_id = su.id LEFT JOIN ted_exam_plan ep ON tepu.plan_id = ep.id AND ep.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN ted_org_class toc ON tepu.batch_id = toc.id AND toc.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN ted_org org ON toc.org_id = org.id AND org.is_deleted = 0 ${ew.customSqlSegment}
